field.name: Target ID
field.notes: It can trigger anything, but it's usually used to trigger Red Coins.

field.name: Shift 8 pixels right
field.notes: If set, the Red Ring will respawn if you change areas and come back.

field.name: Switch Tile States
field.values: 0=No,1=Like a P Switch,2=Like a ! Switch,4=Red Blocks only,5=Like a P Switch + Red Blocks,7=All switchable tiles
field.notes: Switches the state of all two-state tiles; invisible blue coins appear, red coin outlines become collectable, red switch blocks become solid.

field.name: ID Activation mode
field.notes: Works only if Target ID is not equal to 0 and Disable timer is not set.
